dits.title: import, bare import
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 6 (tests/fail.dit)
import
     ^

SyntaxError: Expected a name or filepath string for import

dits.title: import, nonsense after import
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 13 (tests/fail.dit)
import String
            ^

SyntaxError: Expected 'from'

dits.title: import, only name
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 10 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit
         ^

SyntaxError: Expected 'from'

dits.title: import, name from, but no path
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 15 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from
              ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: import, null string
dits.dit:
Str test = null;
import dit from test;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from test;
                ^

SyntaxError: Cannot import from null

dits.title: import, filepath is a list
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from ['troll'];
                ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: import, filepath is a Class
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from class {|Str test = 'nope';|};
                ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: import, filepath is a Class
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 17 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from class {|Str test = 'nope';|};
                ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: import, dotted VALUE_CLASS, not a String
dits.dit:
class storage {|Func path = func(){||};|}
import dit from storage.path;
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 29 (tests/fail.dit)
import dit from storage.path;
                            ^

SyntaxError: Expected str value, not Function

dits.title: import, local file DNE
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 32 (tests/fail.dit)
import 'tests/doesNotExist.dit';
                               ^

FileError: Import failed, file not found

dits.title: import, local file no permission
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 32 (tests/fail.dit)
import '/root/noPermission.dit';
                               ^

FileError: Import failed, permission denied

dits.title: import, remote file 404 error
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 81 (tests/fail.dit)
import 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ditabase/dits/master/new-dits/DNE.dit';
                                                                                ^

FileError: Import failed, HTTP Error 404: Not Found

dits.title: import, failure in remote dit
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 31 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ditabase/dits/master/new-dits/Fail.dit)
Str test = 'Missing Semicolon'
                              ^

SyntaxError: Expected ';'
	at import (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ditabase/dits/master/new-dits/Fail.dit):1:1

dits.title: import, missing new name in monkey patch
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 9 (tests/fail.dit)
Str dit = 'dog';
        ^

SyntaxError: 'dit' has already been declared

dits.title: import, name has already been declared
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 8 (tests/fail.dit)
import test from 'tests/import.dit';
       ^

SyntaxError: 'test' has already been declared

dits.title: import, local anon
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, local full
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, github anon
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, github full
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, VALUE_STRING for filepath
dits.dit:
Str path = 'tests/import.dit';
import dit from path;
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, dotted VALUE_CLASS for filepath
dits.dit:
class storage {|Str path = 'tests/import.dit';|}
import dit from storage.path;
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, VALUE_IMPORT referenced in assignment
dits.dit:
import dit from 'tests/import.dit';
Str test = dit.value;
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, VALUE_IMPORT monkey patched
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, anon import referenced in string assignment
dits.expected: Finished successfully

dits.title: import, anon import referenced in list assignment
dits.expected: Finished successfully
